name: BirthdaySong
0:
”Alexa, open Birthday Song and play Happy Birthday”
”Alexa, ask Birthday Song to play”
”Alexa, ask Birthday Song to play Happy Birthday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday song
des:
We've all been there before, everyone gathers around the table to sing happy birthday and it usually sounds pretty bad. Some people can't carry a tune, others are just mouthing the words, but in most cases there is no accompanying music.

Birthday Song plays a piano version of the Happy Birthday song for you! Now everyone can sing along and sound just a little better when singing Happy Birthday.



The "Happy Birthday Instrumental" song was provided by artist, Alexander.

Skill Icon designed by Vectors Market from Flaticon.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
